missionProperties.startingObjective: Stop the Empire from binding too many Wookiees (&Wookiees Bound&/6 Wookiees bound).
missionProperties.missionInfo:
{-} Rebel mission tokens represent Wookiees.
{-} Imperial Officers and Stormtroopers can bind Wookiees when instructed and and flip the token to the Imperial side.
{-} A healthy hero or <color="red">Chewbacca</color> can interact ({K} or {I}) with a bound Wookiee to free it and flip the token to the Rebel side.
{-} The Rebels win at the end of Round 5.
{-} The Rebels lose when there are 6 bound Wookiees, or when all heroes are wounded and <color="red">Chewbacca</color> is defeated.

globalEvents.name: Open Crate 1
globalEvents.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

entityProperties.name: Crate1
entityProperties.theText: An old supply crate.

globalEvents.eventText:

globalEvents.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

entityProperties.name: Crate3
entityProperties.theText: An old supply crate.

globalEvents.name: Mission Briefing
globalEvents.eventText:
The celebration is wonderful, and the marvelous feast reminds you of why you fight so hard in the first place.

As festivities continue, you notice the Wookiees begin to move slowly, some even staggering and falling down. In the midst of assisting them, you conclude that their traditional drink, the very potent accarragm, has been drugged.

There’s a rumble of an engine as an Imperial shuttle lands in the forest. Stormtroopers rush out and begin rounding up the unconscious Wookiees.

{-} Deploy the heroes to the blue highlighted space.
{-} Deploy <color="red">Chewbacca</color> (Loyal Wookiee) to the red highlighted space. Heroes control him as an ally.
{-} Rebel mission tokens represent Wookiees.
{-} Imperial Officers and Stormtroopers can bind Wookiees when instructed and and flip the token to the Imperial side.
{-} A healthy hero or <color="red">Chewbacca</color> can interact ({K} or {I}) with a bound Wookiee to free it and flip the token to the Rebel side.
{-} The Rebels win at the end of Round 5.
{-} The Rebels lose when there are 6 bound Wookiees, or when all heroes are wounded and <color="red">Chewbacca</color> is defeated.

eventActions.theText: {-}This figure binds an adjacent Wookiee (click "Bind" on the Wookiee). If it did, this figure suffers 1 {H}.
Be adjacent to a free Wookiee.

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels win
globalEvents.eventText: Chewbacca roars in triumph as the Imperials are forced to retreat. You run to the drugged Wookiees and start applying stimpacks as fast as you can. {-} The Rebels win the mission! {-} Rebel players choose one hero to receive the “Intimidation” Reward card. (This Reward card works differently when playing with Imperial Commander. Refer to the Rules Change section of the wiki documentation for details.) {-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels lose
globalEvents.eventText:
The shuttle blasts off with its captives. With a roar, Chewbacca takes off toward your ship, as if ready to make pursuit. Noticing the shambles of the village and a number of his kin still in need of assistance, he gives a low, sorrowful growl and sets down his bowcaster.

{-} The Rebels lose the mission.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels lose Chewie
globalEvents.eventText:
The shuttle blasts off with its captives. With a roar, Chewbacca takes off toward your ship, as if ready to make pursuit. Noticing the shambles of the village and a number of his kin still in need of assistance, he gives a low, sorrowful growl and sets down his bowcaster.

{-} The Rebels lose the mission.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

globalEvents.name: Assault Wave 1
globalEvents.eventText: An Imperial officer shouts to his troops as they pour out of the forest behind you. “Move faster! I don't want your excuses, I want those Wookiees secured for transport!”

globalEvents.name: Assault Wave 2
globalEvents.eventText: In the midst of battle, an explosion causes you to lift your head to find the source of such a massive sound. You see that the Imperials have blown a hole in the side of Chewbacca’ hut and are now running in to arrest even more Wookiees.

entityProperties.name: Wookiee Blue 1 Free
entityProperties.theText:
Zharr, a grizzled Wookiee warrior, is struggling against the effects of the drug.

{-} Imperial Officers and Stormtroopers can bind the Wookiee when instructed and and flip the token to the Imperial side.

entityProperties.name: Wookiee Blue 1 Bound
entityProperties.theText:
Zharr is restrained and about to be abducted by the Empire.

{-} A healthy hero or <color="red">Chewbacca</color> can interact ({K} or {I}) with a bound Wookiee to free it and flip the token to the Rebel side.
